posts.post_content:
Quite ok. However, there is no use to pay any additional cost for a creature to draw a card. In this case, you add 2 mana (see [Leonin Skyhunter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leonin Skyhunter). This means, you have to play 2 additional lands before you play this card.
  
   
Is the card worth it? - I don't think so. You can get an [Assault Zeppelid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Assault Zeppelid) for cmc4. So I think it would have been perfectly balanced if it would have been a 2/3.
posts.html:

Is the card worth it? - I don't think so. You can get an Assault Zeppelid for cmc4. So I think it would have been perfectly balanced if it would have been a 2/3.

Posted By: NoobOfLore (12/25/2010 12:06:00 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Works very well with a Knight of New Alara out - instead of getting a 2/2 and 1 card for 4, you get a 5/5 which is decent by anyone's standards. Having said that, on its own it leaves quite a bit to be desired - you can get superior card draw for 1 (Ponder), and a superior creature for 3 (a 3/3 with flying like Jenara), so the fact that you're combining two lesser versions into one card to save space isn't really a good enough reason to cut so much potential.
posts.html:
